text:
HTTP URL Re-writing Modifier doesn't work for Session Argument Name.
I used request field SessionID to save session identifier.
JMeter set string "SessionID=" in the first request (it was login to a site). 
It is not correct. JMeter 1.8.1 didn't do that.
So all other requests have the same field "SessionID=" instead of filled one.

Note: That Modifier worked fine for version 1.8.1. After I began to use ready 
scripts under 1.9RC3 I met the problem.
creator: vladimir@contera.sp.ru

text:
If you run a script the fist time after you start Jmeter it works correctly. 
The problem takes place for the second, third, etc. run a script.
creator: vladimir@contera.sp.ru
mstover1@apache.org
text:
can you verify you are really running RC3?  I fixed a bug similar to this
between RC2 and RC3 - go into Help->about and check please.

creator: mstover1@apache.org
text:
I fixed something to clear the thread context at the end of test runs which may
help this problem.
